Package org.lwjgl.glfw

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Callbacks.DropConsumerBuffer
    A functional interface that can be used with dropfunNamesApply.
    Callbacks.DropConsumerString
    A functional interface that can be used with dropfunNamesApply.
    GLFWcharfun.SAM
    A functional interface for GLFWcharfun.
    GLFWcharmodsfun.SAM
    A functional interface for GLFWcharmodsfun.
    GLFWcursorenterfun.SAM
    A functional interface for GLFWcursorenterfun.
    GLFWcursorposfun.SAM
    A functional interface for GLFWcursorposfun.
    GLFWdropfun.SAM
    A functional interface for GLFWdropfun.
    GLFWerrorfun.SAM
    A functional interface for GLFWerrorfun.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Callbacks
    Utility class for GLFW callbacks.
    GLFW
    Native bindings to the GLFW library.
    GLFWcharfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetCharCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWcharfun) method.
    GLFWcharmodsfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetCharModsCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWcharmodsfun) method.
    GLFWcursorenterfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetCursorEnterCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWcursorenterfun) method.
    GLFWcursorposfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetCursorPosCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWcursorposfun) method.
    GLFWdropfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetDropCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWdropfun) method.
    GLFWerrorfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetErrorCallback(org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWerrorfun) method.
    GLFWframebuffersizefun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetFramebufferSizeCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWframebuffersizefun) method.
    GLFWgammaramp
    Gamma ramp.
    GLFWimage
    Image data.
    GLFWkeyfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetKeyCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWkeyfun) method.
    GLFWmonitorfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetMonitorCallback(org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWmonitorfun) method.
    GLFWmousebuttonfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetMouseButtonCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWmousebuttonfun) method.
    GLFWscrollfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetScrollCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWscrollfun) method.
    GLFWvidmode
    Video mode.
    GLFWwindowclosefun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetWindowCloseCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWwindowclosefun) method.
    GLFWwindowfocusfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetWindowFocusCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWwindowfocusfun) method.
    GLFWwindowiconifyfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetWindowIconifyCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWwindowiconifyfun) method.
    GLFWwindowposfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetWindowPosCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWwindowposfun) method.
    GLFWwindowrefreshfun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetWindowRefreshCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWwindowrefreshfun) method.
    GLFWwindowsizefun
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetWindowSizeCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWwindowsizefun) method.
